text: Hi there. Have you heard about Save the Children? It is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries
Yes I have heard of this organization.
Fantastic! Have you made a donation to them previously?
No I haven't.  I have made donations to other children's charities though.
Would you care to donate $1? A donation would help ensure children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.
I would be happy to donate $1.  I think it's a good cause. I'd like to hear more about some specific projects but I'll donate anyway.
Wonderful! I'd be happy to share more information with you. Do you have any specific questions?
What countries do they work in primarily?
Great question! Save the Children works worldwide but primarily provides support in developing countries, especially in war zones.
Do they work with refugees?
Yes, working with refugees is one of Save the Children's many priorities!
How much of the donations they receive go to the work on the ground vs overhead costs, do you know?
Good question. In fiscal year 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program services.
Oh wow!  That's quite good.  Do they train local staff or send people in?

Yes! Only 14% is spent on management and fundraising. As far as staff, we have global advocates who provide services but also make sure to provide local staff that is familiar with the locations needs.
Do people who make donations get info on the specific project their money went to or any type of update like that?
Absolutely! We want to be completely transparent. Save the Children has long-standing credentials and international impact.
Where is the organization based out of?
We are in Fairfield, CT!
approximately how many kids were helped last year?
